meanings.definition: The way in which a word is spoken or pronounced.
meanings.sent1: Her pronunciation of the word was clear and easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: I need to work on my pronunciation to sound more like a native speaker.
meanings.sent3: His pronunciation of 'banana' made everyone laugh because it sounded like 'ban-ah-nah'.
meanings.sent4: The pronunciation of her name echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of correct pronunciation by using funny voices.

meanings.definition: The act or result of producing the sounds of speech.
meanings.sent1: The pronunciation of the words was muffled due to the bad audio quality.
meanings.sent2: She practiced the pronunciation of the difficult words until she got them right.
meanings.sent3: The robot's pronunciation of human words was so robotic that it sounded funny.
meanings.sent4: The pronunciation of the wind through the trees was like a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The singer's pronunciation of the lyrics was so clear that every word could be understood.
